name: Docker
description: Docker is a platform that enables developers to build, share, run, and manage applications with containers. A container is a standard unit of software that packages up code and all its dependencies so the application runs quickly and reliably from one computing environment to another.
benefits: Consistent environments across development, testing, and production
usage_notes: Requires a Dockerfile to define the container image.
Images are built from Dockerfiles and stored in registries (e.g., Docker Hub).
example_command: docker build -t my-app . && docker run my-app
